app.containers.App.app.title: Global Plastic Advocacy Tracker
app.containers.App.actortypes_about.1: UN Member States and Observer States: targeted by advocacy, outreach activities and tasks; having positions on topics; belonging to groups and regions
app.containers.App.actortypes_about.2: List of relevant organisations, including those that contacts work for
app.containers.App.actortypes_about.3: List of contacts, targeted by advocacy, outreach activities and tasks, and participating in interactions
app.containers.App.actortypes_about.4: Groups of countries, based on geographic classifications
app.containers.App.actortypes_about.5: Groups of actors (countries, contacts, organisations) based on associations
app.containers.App.actiontypes_about.1: Including formal statements and informal expressions that indicate States' positions on specific topics
app.containers.App.actiontypes_about.2: Including both official negotiation process and other relevant events
app.containers.App.actiontypes_about.3: Detailing plans for engagements with States at specific events or for specific advocacy purposes
app.containers.App.actiontypes_about.4: Detailing plans for advocating of specific topics or for specific purposes
app.containers.App.resourcetypes_about.1: Principal references for the activities contained in this database
